revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Berry Forest |image = [[File:Berry Forest.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Berry Forest. |tokens = 1,750 |location = Sevii Island 3. }} '''Berry Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 18,120 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Pidgey.png|40px]] Pidgey || colspan=2, rowspan=16|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Pidgeotto.png|40px]] Pidgeotto |- | [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish |- | [[File:Gloom.png|40px]] Gloom |- | [[File:Venonat.png|40px]] Venonat |- | [[File:Psyduck.png|40px]] Psyduck |- | [[File:Golduck.png|40px]] Golduck |- | [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Poliwag |- | [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Weepinbell.png|40px]] Weepinbell |- | [[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Slowbro.png|40px]] Slowbro |- | [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee |- | [[File:Exeggcute.png|40px]] Exeggcute |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |}
